Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [Cm]What I am, Thine [Fm]eye can see, [Cm]Yet I come, O L[Bb]ord, to Thee: Th[Cm]ough my sins are c[Fm]rimson red, [Cm]Yet for [G]me Thy b[Cm7]lood was shed.
Chorus: [Cm]This my plea, my [Fm]only plea: Th[Cm]rough Thy off’ring [Bb]once for me, [Cm]I may cast my[Fm]self on Thee, [Cm]Jesus, [G]my Red[Cm7]eemer.
Verse 2: [Cm]As I am, I s[Fm]eek Thy face, K[Cm]neeling at the d[Bb]oor of Grace; [Cm]O forgive this h[Fm]eart of mine, Cl[Cm]eanse me [G]now and [Cm7]seal me Thine.
Verse 3: [Cm]As I am, O b[Fm]lessed Lord, [Cm]I believe and t[Bb]rust Thy word; [Cm]Let my soul no [Fm]longer roam, [Cm]Take, O t[G]ake this w[Cm7]and’rer home.
Verse 4: [Cm]Lost, but found, my [Fm]sins forgiv’n, C[Cm]hild of God and [Bb]heir of Heav’n; [Cm]Lost, but found, what [Fm]joy is mine! [Cm]Thou dost cl[G]eanse and [Cm7]keep me Thine.
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 what i am thine eye can see yet i come o lord to thee though my sins are crimson red yet for me thy blood was shed chorus this my plea my only plea through thy offring once for me i may cast myself on thee jesus my redeemer verse 2 as i am i seek thy face kneeling at the door of grace o forgive this heart of mine cleanse me now and seal me thine verse 3 as i am o blessed lord i believe and trust thy word let my soul no longer roam take o take this wandrer home verse 4 lost but found my sins forgivn child of god and heir of heavn lost but found what joy is mine thou dost cleanse and keep me thine
